content: 1HoDLCLUB 1 mBTC Fuck Fiat Money coinWelcome everyone to the Official 1HoDLCLUB 1mBTC Fine Silver 999.9coin, the first "Fuck Fiat Money" collection coins sale!This is the first official collection of the year 2023 of the 1HoDLCLUB! A big thank you to all the people who have supported me for more than 2 years now!This is a 1 Euro design Bitcoin version coin, on the front we find the famous design of the 1 Euro coin with the 1 mBTC modification, unlike the 1 Euro coin which has no value, that this is in Fine Silver 999.9 Gold plated to take up the two tone design of the original piece! the coin is the same diameter as a 1 Euro coin but just 0.5g heavier !Unlike the euro, this piece has a real value, it is in Fine Silver and moreover it is loaded in Bitcoin!The hologram is inspired by the back of the original 1 Euro coin, but here with "Vitruvian PEPE" instead of the original "Vitruvian Man", each hologram has the firstbits laser engraved on it!To preserve the design of the coin, the serial numbers are not laser engraved on the coin, but written directly on the COA, This is a limited edition of 210 pieces! in reference to 21 million Bitcoin!All the coins have the denomination 1 mBTC and are sold loaded [Of course they will be loaded once they reach the hands of their new owners and loading gonna be made by batch]Since this is the official sale, there is no limit on the purchase of coins per member. Serial Numbers cannot be choose, first arrived, first served. 1HoDLCLUB "Fuck Fiat Money" 1mBTC Fine Silver 999.9 CoinMintage : 210 -  120 SOLD / 90 AVAILABLEMaterial : Fine Silver 999.9Size : 23mmThickness : 2mmWeight : 8 gDenomination : 1 mBTC (0.001 BTC)Serial : 1 to 210The price is [80$]  per chip + 0.001 BTC loading per coin + shipping costThe seconds orders batch will be sent on Tuesday, March 14, 2023!Shipping cost [Express + Tracking] :Worldwide:1 - 10 coins : 18$11 - 25 coins : 23$Europe:1-10 coins - 15$11 - 25 coins : 20$Payment Adress :BTC :
